Once upon a time, there was a big old bull named Bob. Bob lived on a farm with many other animals. He had a friend named Tim, who was a little boy. Tim loved to visit Bob and play with him.
One sunny day, Tim came to see Bob with a book in his hand. Tim said, "Bob, I want to read this book to you." Bob was happy

and full of stars. Sue and her mom were having a fun time, but they could not see very well in the night.
Then, something unexpected happened. They saw a big, bright star fall from the sky. It landed right in front of them! The star was not a star at all, but a big, shiny rock. Sue and her mom were very surprised. They took the rock home and showed it to everyone. Now, they had a special rock from the night sky to remember their walk.

Spot went to the park where he and his owner liked to play. He saw a big tree and a little squirrel. The squirrel had something in its hands. Spot barked and the squirrel dropped it. It was the owner's pants! Spot picked them up and ran back home.
Spot passed by many friends on his way home. They all said, "Good job, Spot!" When Spot got home, he gave the pants to his owner. His owner was so happy. Spot was a hero. And from that day on, everyone knew Spot was a very gifted dog.

Bella and Ben were very sad. They had no more fun. They had no more bouncing.
